body_html: I think I have figured it out - the problem happens when invoking clean inline with build, as in "python setup.py clean build develop"; NinjaBuilder creates the build file, and then the clean step destroys the dir and the file.
body_text: I think I have figured it out - the problem happens when invoking clean inline with build, as in "python setup.py clean build develop"; NinjaBuilder creates the build file, and then the clean step destroys the dir and the file.
body: I think I have figured it out - the problem happens when invoking clean inline with build, as in "python setup.py clean build develop"; NinjaBuilder creates the build file, and then the clean step destroys the dir and the file.
